title: News: Rhye Announce 3 European Dates
body:
In the last few minutes, band of the moment, **Rhye**, have announced 3 bespoke shows across Europe.

The 3 headline gigs in London, Brussels and Berlin will coincide with the release of their debut LP , _Woman_, due out on Polydor.

We’ve already heard it so expect us to be smugly singing along at the front.

### St Giles-In-The-Fields Church, London – Tue, 05 Mar 2013

### Witloof Bar, Brussels – Wed, 06 Mar 2013

Roter Salon, Berlin – Mon, 11 Mar, 2013

Grab tickets [here.](http://rhye.seetickets.com/tour/rhye)
